info.name: Monte Pi
info.description: approximating pi using the Monte-Carlo method.

renderpass.code:
#define mainImage(O,u)\
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy, p = (u+u - R) / R.y;\
    O = texture(iChannel0, u/R);\
    p = clamp(vec2(p.x-.5, p.y-1.)*.5+.5, 0., 1.);\
   	O.y = texture(iChannel1, fract(clamp(p*16., vec2(0), vec2(8,1)))/16. + vec2(floor(10.*fract(O.z*pow(10., floor(p.x*16.+floor(p.y*16.)*16.)-1.))), 12)/16.).x;\
    O = O.xxxx + vec4(0,O.y,0,0);
renderpass.name: Image
Buffer A
